What is it?
Nerd of the Dead is an independent webseries comedy / action about nerds and zombies made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹to move freely on the internet. Also in the production phase, the season has four or more episodes of 15 minutes each.
About what?
The story is about two nerds who are preparing a long time for the zombie apocalypse. When it does happen, the dream becomes reality, and they depart on the adventure of their lives. The series is less focused on the drama of survival, and more for the freedom to live in a world without laws, unlike most of the works on the genre.
How the idea came about?
The idea came from the webseries another even bigger: a feature film called "Carnival of the Dead." Although this project was too ambitious, the idea still existed and became the story of The Dead Nerd. Several partners and collaborators talent were very interested by the script and soon the team was formed and the project has entered production.
Because the format for internet?
Making short films is cool, but the range is never as great as we would like. And to make a long very expensive, and it is very difficult to distribute. So the internet seemed the best vehicle, since we can strike anyone and we still have the freedom to create the content we want.
